column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////We absolutely loved the design of this place. Â Comfortable and cool
column3: we felt right at home here. Food was mostly excellent. Rib eye steak was perfect
column4: her short rib stroganoff was good (quite rich)
column5: we didn't love the duck terrine or the elote corn
column6: but loved the brussel sprouts. Our waiter
column8: was great and was able to recommend a good bottle of wine when our first choice was not available. Already looking forward to the next time.
